ホロライブプロダクション is a virtual youtube agency owned by japanese tech camera company cover corporation.
In addition to acting as a multi-channel network,
ホロライブプロダクション also handles merchandising especially in music production and concert organization.
As of April 2022, the agency managed to succeed in recruiting between 4-1のバロペコーラーのフィギュアを推進、
including several of the most-subscribed features.
